title: Naiad
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171802im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Naiad_Typophile_4401.png)
  
Specimen [PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171802/http:/www.fontspring.com/tools/asset/7659fcd4f9a32017498d3e2406703bef/Naiad_Specimen.pdf)  
Available at [FontSpring](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171802/http:/www.fontspring.com/fonts/shinntype/naiad)

Somewhat coincidentally, last night I watched _Million Dollar Mermaid_, the Annette Kellerman biopic starring Esther Williams, on TCM; it was part of their day-long tribute, following her death last week.
author: Nick Shinn

comments.content: Very nice, Nick :-) Those swashes and ligatures look lovely.
Great execution Nick. Good luck with it!
What a elegant face, Nick! Excellent job!
